Day 1. Have not written a single word on either essay because I don't understand a single fucking word of what I'm reading
I have fallen behind in every single aspect of my life. This was not the right time to take on a mess at work and attempt to fix it.
Four day weekend ahead. Two essays due within 10 days. Guess what I'll be doing all weekend?
Just accidentally poked myself in the face with my car key. It's been that kind of day.
How many informative abortion websites can we make? How can we make it so that when a woman looks for info, she finds useful, safe info?
@TheGoodDeath my husband had cancer 10 yrs ago. Six months of treatment. Our out of pocket was less than $600. #australia #medicare
@TheGoodDeath also, generic antibiotics (amoxicillin) ~$5. I don't understand why some US ppl think this is a bad thing! Yay Medicare!
@TheGoodDeath depo provera shot $24. Implanon $40. Pill $10-30/4mths. Less on a concession. Yay for socialised medicine! #australia
@realDonaldTrump #AlternativeFacts
@gilmae @handmethepanda I think it's the very first thing they teach you at library school
